summary: Website for J M Construction, a Kolkata-based sanitary and plumbing contractor with 8 years of experience and 3 decades of family business history
architectural_notes: Website for J M Construction contractor business
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional hero background image showing plumbing or construction work in progress (hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png)
- Company logo featuring construction or plumbing tools with 'J M Construction' text (logo.dim_300x300.png)
- Icon representing sanitary services with modern fixtures (sanitary-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon representing plumbing services with pipes or wrenches (plumbing-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage showcasing J M Construction as a Kolkata-based sanitary and plumbing contractor with 8 years of experience and 3 decades of family business history
Create an About section describing the company's expertise in sanitary and plumbing contracting services
Create a Services section listing the main service offerings for residential and commercial clients
Create a Contact section with a form for potential clients to reach out for quotes or inquiries

Apply a professional, trustworthy design theme appropriate for a construction and contracting business, using warm, earthy tones (such as browns, oranges, or grays) with clean typography and a structured layout that conveys reliability and expertise

new_feature_requests.summary: Create company website with business information
Display company credentials (8 years experience, family business)
